aq(gm)qSunA# tE aq(gm)qSuH pRu#cyatAqM paru#ShAq paru#rgaqndhastEq kAma#mavatuq madA#yaq rasOq acyu#tOq &mAtyO#&si SuqkrastEq grahOq&Bi tyaM dEqva(gm) sa#viqtAra#mUqNyO$H kaqvikra#tuqmarcA#mi saqtyasa#vasa(gm) ratnaqdhAmaqBi priqyaM maqtimUqd^^rdhvA yasyAqmatiqrBA adi#dyutaqth savI#maniq hira#Nya pANiramimIta suqkratu#H kRuqpA suva#H | praqjABya#stvA prAqNAya# tvA vyAqnAya# tvA praqjAstvamanuq ( ) prANi#hi praqjAstvAmanuq prANa#ntu || 13
(anu# - saqpta ca#) (A6)
